page.title: 13Farming in the area
page.content: We went to Mr Milners farm, it is called Prescote Manor Farm, and we asked him some questions about the farm and his job.Here are the questions and the answers he gave. 1)Do you like living on a farm? Yes 2)Do you like your job? Yes 3)What kind of animals do you have? Pigs cows and a bull. 4)How many buildings have you? 3 sets. 5)How much machinery do you have?45-50 6)Do you make hay? Not a lot. 7)Do you have any helpers? Yes. 8)How many helpers do you have? 2 9)What is your hardest time of the year? Late summer. 10)What do you do with your crops? Sell them. 11)What food do you give to your animals? Silage, grass and nuts. 12)What do you like best about your job? Working in the country.
